snippet: Rick Santorum refuses to mention Mitt Romney by name, raising speculation about his motives.
abstract: Rick Santorum refuses to mention Mitt Romney by name, raising speculation about his motives.
lead_paragraph: SOMERSWORTH, N.H. - Rick Santorum spent his final full day of campaigning in New Hampshire by soft-pedaling his criticism of Mitt Romney, who is ahead in the polls.

headline.main: As Rivals Blast Romney, Santorum Offers Milder Criticism
